scripts.localnet:old: npm run localnet:down || exit 0; solana-test-validator -q -r --ledger .anchor/test-ledger --mint $(solana-keygen pubkey ~/.config/solana/id.json) --bind-address 0.0.0.0 --rpc-port 8899 --bpf-program SW1TCH7qEPTdLsDHRgPuMQjbQxKdH2aBStViMFnt64f ./target/deploy/switchboard_v2.so --url https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com --clone Fi8vncGpNKbq62gPo56G4toCehWNy77GgqGkTaAF5Lkk --clone CyZuD7RPDcrqCGbNvLCyqk6Py9cEZTKmNKujfPi3ynDd --clone J7nSEX8ADf3pVVicd6yKy2Skvg8iLePEmkLUisAAaioD & npm run localnet:wait
scripts.localnet:wait: for attempt in {1..30}; do sleep 1; if curl -sS http://localhost:8899 -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1, "method":"getBlockHeight"}'; then echo ready; break; fi; done
